title: Kit sponsorship revenue of German Bundesliga clubs 2019/20
yAxis: Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 1._FC_Köln_(Rewe) to FSV_Mainz_05_(Kömmerling).
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from Fortuna_Düsseldorf_(Henkel) to SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker).
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom) to VfL_Wolfsburg_(Volkswagen).
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from VfL_Wolfsburg_(Volkswagen) to RB_Leipzig_(Red_Bull).
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from RB_Leipzig_(Red_Bull) to 1._FC_Köln_(Rewe).
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from FSV_Mainz_05_(Kömmerling) to Fortuna_Düsseldorf_(Henkel).
gold: This statistic depicts the kit sponsorship revenue of each German Bundesliga club in the 2019/20 season . FC Bayern Munich will receive 35 million euros from its kit sponsor Telekom in the 2019/20 season .
